EmailTemplate.subject: Integrated chronic condition management
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Point solutions do not scale Employers and members alike are experiencing fatigue from having to contend with multiple uncoordinated programs to manage their chronic conditions. Teladoc Health now offers chronic condition solutions, providing a unified, consumer-focused experience that can address one or multiple chronic conditions. Easy‑to‑use online tools and services for diabetes, prediabetes and cardiovascular condition management create personalized, actionable and timely support.
